column1: The logs related to devices should be seen in ""Reports and Analysis > Log Reports"".
Can you please confrim if the log is present there?
If not can you please update the policeis on the Epp client and see if the icon is blinking?
This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Thank you for your prompt reply.
Yes I'm able to see the logs from the EPP Admin portal. My question is how
can a user see the logs for his blocked devices with the exact policy under
which his device or content gets blocked.
